This is the Chinese translated version of the original Thrassian Plaguesword mod.
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23350/
All credit to the original author Fearless Hero.

For more information, please refer to the original mod.

Installation
Copy the FH_Plaguesword.esp file and the FH-Plaguesword.bsa file from the downloaded archive into your game\'s Data directory. Enable FH_Plaguesword.esp in data files.
??????????DATA?????ESP

Credit
All credit with Fearless Hero, thank him for this great MOD!

If you like this MOD, please endorse the author, thank you!

About our group
ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM™ is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: skyrimmodteam@gmail.com
OR, you can directly PM me here.
